row.name: JOBS.R3.IMPORTA_JOB
row.description: Importação de jobs SAP para UC4

row.pre_process: !:inc JOBI.GENERIC.PRE_PROCESS, NOFOUND=IGNORE !:put_att HOST=&instance# !!:put_att LOGIN='LOGIN.SAP.IMPORT.&instance#' !:if &instance#='PR3' !: put_att LOGIN='LOGIN.SAP.RFCUC4' !:endif !:set &to#=conv_date('yyyy-mm-dd:&prpt_to#','yyyymmdd') !:set &from#=conv_date('yyyy-mm-dd:&prpt_from#','yyyymmdd')
